response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which holds immense value for you at $12,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose an exclusive offer tailored for you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,800. This represents a significant saving of $1,200 compared to the standard price. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our product. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 10800}
